long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eragon Fishing is a funny game that is inspired by "Gold miner" game. It is the first game in the series of games on Eragon.

You play a role of a fisherman to fish and climb the leaderboard and compete with other players to be the greatest fisherman

Besides, you can invite your friend to the game. The more friends, the more exciting.
